activities.description: Curry Without Worry believes that hunger is not defined by an empty stomach, so they're open to whomever hungers. Dinner served at 5:30pm at UN Plaza
activities.place: First Baptist Church, Octavia and Waller

activities.description: Coastal Cleanup. Golden Gate Audubon Society is dedicated to protecting Bay Area birds, other wildlife, and their natural habitats by restoring habitats and connecting people of all ages and backgrounds with the natural world

Evening recreation group game and movie night. The Arc San Francisco is a lifelong learning and achievement center for over 700 individuals with developmental disabilities in San Francisco, San Mateo and Marin counties

Paint a sidewalk mural to help Tenderloin kids get around the neighborhood safely. Tenderloin Safe Passage is a community of neighborhood groups, parents, youth-serving agencies, and schools dedicated to making the Tenderloin neighborhood a safer place for all
Serve a meal or volunteer as a group.Every day, St. Anthony's provides essential support to those living in poverty in SF
Volunteer shift. SF Food Bank (our partner for go/give) distributes food throughout the city to people from all walks of life
Volunteer shift. At the Crossroads seeks to reach out to homeless youth and young adults at their point of need and work with them to build healthy and fulfilling lives
Volunteer shift. 826 Valencia is dedicated to supporting under-resourced students ages 6-18 with their creative and expository writing skills and helping teachers inspire their students to write
Volunteer shift. Project Open Hand provides meals with love to seniors and the critically ill
Tree planting. Friends of the Urban Forest promotes a larger, healthier urban forest as part of San Franciscoâ€™s green infrastructure through community planting, tree care, education, and advocacy
